paragraphs: Scatter had ready a web application to connect local businesses with customers. They needed a website before the launch.
We've created a couple of landing pages describing product features both for businesses and customers. And a Pricing page to let visitors subscribe to their services.
The requirements were big typography, big background images, intuitive graphics to explain product features.
